name: Qadeer Ghafurzai
story: Latif is a seasoned scout with years of experience in the OPFOR army. He is known for his excellent tracking skills and has led many successful reconnaissance missions. Despite his years on the battlefield, he remains a solitary figure, preferring his own company over that of others. Some say he has lost his faith along the way, but Latif remains tight-lipped about his innermost thoughts and feelings.
